downloadTitle: Update for Microsoft Visual Studio 2013 Update 1 (KB2932965)
downloadDescription: This Microsoft Update fixes the issue in Visual Studio 2013 Update 1 that causes the Notifications hub to stop displaying notifications for updates to Visual Studio or installed Visual Studio extensions.
detailsSection:
Visual Studio 2013 Update 1 blocks notifications related to new releases or updates for Visual Studio and installed extensions. 
This fix targets the group of users who have downloaded Update 1 and ensures that they have timely access to future update information in the Notifications hub. Users without Update 1 or users who install future updates will not be impacted.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Change.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
